有时，我一直在想，为什么要玩cs呢？为什么呢？我在这里讲一个故事吧。因为喜欢一个硬核的极其小众的fps游戏

Valve really needs to do a large overhaul of this game.... Over 30 wins and 4 losses and I gain a rank.... One game of blatant cheaters followed by a game where one teammate AFK's for 10 rounds and 2 teammates leave... I derank again...  The sad truth is the reason so many people have abandoned this game is because of valves lack of upkeep. The cheating is rampant... People intentionally que'd with cheaters are not punished... Leavers/afk's are not punished harsh enough... The ranking system is broken... Either put out a new generation of CS, or fix what you're supporting and want to work.. Rather than sitting back collecting what little money you're still getting from the case scam...
